declarations.name: h
declarations.description:
Production h() function based on Preact by
Jason Miller (@developit)
Licensed under the MIT License
https://github.com/developit/preact/blob/master/LICENSE

Modified for Stencil's compiler and vdom

declarations.name: setNonce

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: The value to be assigned to the platform nonce property.

declarations.description:
Assigns the given value to the nonce property on the runtime platform object.
During runtime, this value is used to set the nonce attribute on all dynamically created script and style tags.

declarations.name: registerInstance
declarations.description:
Register a lazy instance with the hostRefs object so it's
corresponding d.HostRef can be retrieved later.

{

declarations.name: LoggedIn

members.name: weight
members.description: Passthrough prop for weight of the text

members.name: color
members.description: Passthrough prop for the color of the text

members.name: maxLines
members.description:
The maximum lines to display before truncating the text.
Default behavior shows all lines of text with no truncation.

declarations.name: Default
Sizes
declarations.default:
{
  render: () => `
      <true-text-base size="xxxl">Size XXXL</true-text-base>
      <true-text-base size="xxl">Size XXL</true-text-base>
      <true-text-base size="xl">Size XL</true-text-base>
      <true-text-base size="l">Size L</true-text-base>
      <true-text-base size="m">Size M</true-text-base>
      <true-text-base size="s">Size S</true-text-base>
      <true-text-base size="xs">Size XS</true-text-base>
      <true-text-base size="xxs">Size XXS</true-text-base>
    `,
}

members.name: color
members.description:
Primary color of the text
Uses predefined css variables

members.name: maxLines
members.description:
Maximum lines to display before truncating the text
If no value is given all lines will show
